pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthaggahaṇampi sādiyanti,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.2_7: kāyampi tadatthāya upasaṁharanti etassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.3_0: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.4_0: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthaggahaṇampi sādiyissanti,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.4_7: kāyampi tadatthāya upasaṁharissanti etassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāyā”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.5_2: chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthaggahaṇampi sādiyanti,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.5_9: kāyampi tadatthāya upasaṁharanti etassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāyā”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.8_2: chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthaggahaṇampi sādiyissanti,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.8_9: kāyampi tadatthāya upasaṁharissanti etassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.10_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.11.1_0: “Yā pana bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthaggahaṇaṁ vā sādiyeyya,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.11.1_7: kāyaṁ vā tadatthāya upasaṁhareyya etassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāya,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:2.1.10_0: manussapuriso, na yakkho na peto na tiracchānagato viññū paṭibalo kāyasaṁsaggaṁ samāpajjituṁ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:2.1.12_0: hattho nāma kapparaṁ upādāya yāva agganakhā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:2.1.13_0: Etassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāya ubbhakkhakaṁ adhojāṇumaṇḍalaṁ gahaṇaṁ sādiyati,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:2.1.15_0: etassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāya nivatthaṁ vā pārutaṁ vā gahaṇaṁ sādiyati,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:2.1.17_0: etassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāya purisassa hatthapāse tiṭṭhati, āpatti thullaccayassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:2.1.19_0: etassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāya purisassa hatthapāse ṭhitā sallapati, āpatti thullaccayassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:2.1.21_0: etassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāya purisena— “itthannāmaṁ okāsaṁ āgacchā”ti—vuttā gacchati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:2.1.24_0: etassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāya purisassa abbhāgamanaṁ sādiyati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:2.1.27_0: etassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāya yena kenaci paṭicchannaṁ okāsaṁ paviṭṭhamatte āpatti thullaccayassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:2.1.29_0: etassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāya purisassa hatthapāse ṭhitā kāyaṁ upasaṁharati,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:2.1.33_0: seyyathāpi nāma tālo matthakacchinno abhabbo puna viruḷhiyā evameva bhikkhunī aṭṭhamaṁ vatthuṁ paripūrentī assamaṇī hoti asakyadhītā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:2.1.35_0: saṁvāso nāma ekakammaṁ ekuddeso samasikkhatā. Eso saṁvāso nāma.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:2.1.36_0: So tāya saddhiṁ natthi. Tena vuccati asaṁvāsāti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:2.2.11_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho, ayyāyo, aṭṭha pārājikā dhammā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:2.2.12_0: Yesaṁ bhikkhunī aññataraṁ vā aññataraṁ vā āpajjitvā na labhati bhikkhunīhi saddhiṁ saṁvāsaṁ,
